body_html:
I've encountred the same problem when I'm instantiating an Interpreter from a tflite file in android.

java.lang.NullPointerException: Internal error: Cannot allocate memory for the interpreter: tensorflow/contrib/lite/kernels/transpose_conv.cc:82 SizeOfDimension(input, 3) != SizeOfDimension(weights, 3) (512 != 256)Node 54 failed to prepare

Indeed, when building the model I've changed the channels from 512 to 256 by using Conv2DTranspose in keras. I've referred to tf_ops_compatibility, it seems CONV_2D_TRANSPOSE is fully supported?

I've encountred the same problem when I'm instantiating an Interpreter from a tflite file in android.
java.lang.NullPointerException: Internal error: Cannot allocate memory for the interpreter: tensorflow/contrib/lite/kernels/transpose_conv.cc:82 SizeOfDimension(input, 3) != SizeOfDimension(weights, 3) (512 != 256)Node 54 failed to prepare
Indeed, when building the model I've changed the channels from 512 to 256 by using Conv2DTranspose in keras. I've referred to tf_ops_compatibility, it seems CONV_2D_TRANSPOSE is fully supported?
body:
I've encountred the same problem when I'm instantiating an Interpreter from a tflite file in android.

java.lang.NullPointerException: Internal error: Cannot allocate memory for the interpreter: tensorflow/contrib/lite/kernels/transpose_conv.cc:82 SizeOfDimension(input, 3) != SizeOfDimension(weights, 3) (512 != 256)Node 54 failed to prepare

Indeed, when building the model I've changed the channels from 512 to 256 by using Conv2DTranspose in keras. I've referred to [tf_ops_compatibility](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/lite/g3doc/tf_ops_compatibility.md), it seems CONV_2D_TRANSPOSE is fully supported?
